item.description: Update Traffic Collision; INC#0817; 12:55PM; 4626 W Hollywood Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rTsi2b; #EastHollywood; Solo passenger vehicle approximately 5-10' into a restaurant, striking and injuring two persons, believed to be restaurant patrons (unclear if within building or dining al fresco), as well as injuring that car's driver. The total of three patients: The 27 year-old male and 27 year-old female "patrons" (unknown affiliation) in serious condition, as well as the 84 year-old male driver of the car, in undetermined condition, have been taken to a regional trauma center by LAFD Paramedics. All remaining occupants of the two-story building that contains apartments above the restaurant, as well as downstairs retail store, have been temporarily moved outdoors until the damaged structure can be formally assessed for structural integrity by an L.A. Department of Building & Safety Inspector, ETA 1:45 PM. Media Inquiries: LAPD Central Traffic Division (Incident #2145); FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E11 E20 E82 EM11 RA20 RA27 RA56; CH4; 14; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision; INC#0817; 12:19PM; 4626 W Hollywood Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rTsi2b; #EastHollywood; PRELIM: Traffic collision with reports of one or more pedestrians struck and vehicle into commercial building. ; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; E11 E82 RA27 RA56; CH4; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Brush Fire; INC#0481; 09:29AM; EB 134 Fwy west of Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3H85Fxw; #EagleRock; The first arriving 30 LAFD ground personnel took just 22 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish an approximately 20' x 40' fire involving hillside vegetation south of the Obama (SR 134) Highway west of Figueroa Street. No structure damage. No injury. The fire cause is under investigation; FS 42; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AO1 BC1 BC2 E11 E12 E201 E220 E250 E47 E55 E56 EM1 H6 HA6 RA55 T1 T20 T50; CH5; 15; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#0481; 09:07AM; EB 134 Fwy west of Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3H85Fxw; #EagleRock; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to currently less than one acre of vegetation burning south of the 134 Freeway.; FS 42; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 E11 E12 E201 E250 E47 E55 E56 EM1 H6 HA6 RA55 T1 T50; CH5; 15; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Brush Fire; INC#0423; 09:00AM; 2402 N Highland Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rQV1EM; #HollywoodHills; The first arriving 30 LAFD ground personnel, aided by precise helicopter water drops, took just 30 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish an approximately 50' x 50' fire in medium-to-heavy brush approximately 200' up a steep hillside west of the Hollywood (US 101) Freeway near the Hollywood Bowl. Though there are winds in our region, they were not a factor at this fire. The flames did not threaten or damage any structures at the Hollywood Bowl or any nearby homes. The was no call for evacuation. No injuries have been reported. The fire cause is under investigation.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO2 BC11 BC14 CM52 E227 E260 E290 E41 E60 E76 E82 E90 E97 EM14 H3 H5 H6 HA3 HA5 HA6 RA76 T27 T60 WT88; CH5; 12; Brian Humphrey

Update Brush Fire; INC#0423; 08:53AM; 3199 N Barham Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3u7J54t; #HollywoodHills; Fire has a low-to-moderate rate of spread in medium-to-heavy brush. Wind and embers are NOT an issue at this time. Ground-based LAFD crews have assembled west of the Hollywood (US 101) Freeway near the Hollywood Bowl, and have begun fire attack to flank the fire, as LAFD water-dropping helicopters arrive at scene. The fire is NOT currently a threat to structures at the Hollywood Bowl or any nearby homes. There is presently NO call for evacuation.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC11 BC14 E227 E260 E290 E41 E60 E76 E82 E90 E97 EM14 H3 H5 H6 HA3 HA5 HA6 RA76 T27 T60; CH5; 12; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#0423; 08:30AM; 3199 N Barham Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3u7J54t; #HollywoodHills; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to now 50' x 50' area of vegetation burning 200' uphill in medium to heavy brush west of Hollywood (US 101) Freeway.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC11 BC14 E227 E260 E41 E60 E76 E82 E90 E97 EM14 H0A H0C RA76 T27 T60; CH5; 12; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0349; 08:26AM; 320 N Juanita Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nZ0E2x; #EastHollywood; 58 firefighters took just 21 minutes in offensive operations to access, confine and fully extinguish fire within a vacant 40' x 100' one-story commercial building. No injury. Fire cause under investigation; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC5 CM22 E11 E211 E220 E235 E52 E6 EM25 EM5 RA6 RA806 T11 T20 T35; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0349; 08:05AM; 320 N Juanita Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nZ0E2x; #EastHollywood; PRELIM: Vacant 40' x 100' one-story commercial building; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC5 CM22 E11 E211 E220 E235 E52 E6 EM5 RA6 RA806 T11 T20 T35; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1609; 08:54PM; 225 W 25th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qXmkOw; Historic South-Central; KNOCKDOWN: 29 firefighters extinguished the fire in 20 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was contained to the unit of origin and prevented from extending into the adjacent units. The smoke is currently being cleared from the building. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 E10 E14 E15 E210 E215 RA15 SQ21 T10 T15; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart
